verses.t: They that trust Lord in the shall be as mount Zion, which cannot be removed, but abideth for ever.
As the mountains are round about Jerusalem, Lord so the is round about his people from henceforth even for ever.
For the rod of the wicked shall not rest upon the lot of the righteous; lest the righteous put forth their hands unto iniquity.
Do good, Lord O, unto those that be good, and to them that are upright in their hearts.
As for such as turn aside unto their crooked ways, Lord the shall lead them forth with the workers of iniquity: but peace shall be upon Israel.
